pullRequest.body:
This PR adds instances for `SMulZeroClass R (HahnSeries Γ R)` and `SMulZeroClass R (HahnModule Γ R V)`.  Also, some minor variable cleanup.

---


[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

Looks good to me. Minor question. Feel free to address it however you seem fit.

bors d+
What is the reason for inlining these typeclass assumptions?
I cannot remember any particular reason.  I have restored the variable declaration inside a small section.
